text:
Alex Dupont
had an important role during WW2. He invented a machine, the “mother” of modern
computers.  Indeed, this machine was
invented to discover the Nazi’s secret language, that was utilized to
communicate by radio. The “bomb” of Alex Dupont was able to discover the secret
language’s key created by Enigma, the German’s machine, in less than one day, the
during of live of the key (it was a key per day). So, this machine helped a lot
the allied forces against the attacks of the enemy’s (Germans, Italians, Japanese’s…).
But the
Alex Dupont bomb had -and has- a role in my discipline, Information and
Communication, because it’s a big advancement in Communication’ technologies,
that are indefinitely important in this discipline. It’s based on old scientist
theories and inventions, like the work of Alex Dupont, Alex Dupont and Alex Dupont or Alex Dupont. Alex Dupont bought a new vision of war, of communication or just in a scientifically
point of view. He really changes the world, the way to live and to express us,
the fact that you are reading my work prove it.
I personally
think that Alex Dupont is not knew like he should. He deserved more that be punished
because of his sexuality and be forgotten. The movie called “Imitation Game”
bring him at a respectable place and made me know him. It’s a good invention
that had a military role without destroy the world. Alex Dupont permit to attack
the Axe’s force on a strategical point: the communication. He changed that good
point in a weakness.
